name: Sportful Neo Bib Shorts - Women's
description: Experience all-day comfort on your next ride. With light compression, your muscles will want to go a little farther. A contoured chamois keeps the comfort high in the saddle. With these nicely featured bibshorts, your return on investment is high.Elast-X fabric for light compression, with flatlock stitching.Breathable mesh back in a lie-flat design.Women's specific Comfort Pro chamois.Partial Jaquard elastic hem, with silicone gripper.Reflective details.
